page.title: 19TRANSPORT - AUCHINLECK
page.content: There is an hourly bus service provided by Western S.M.T. connecting Auchinleck to surrounding towns and villages.Recently the same company introduced a{Cityliner}bus linking Glasgow to Dumfries by a fast (limited stop) service This bus runs 4 times a day and Auchinleck is a stopping point. A new railway station was opened in Auchinleck in 1984 with a direct link to Glasgow and Dumfries.Only some passenger trains stop and fares have to be paid on the train. Both bus and rail companies offer concessionary fares for old age pensioners outwith peak periods. There is also a Coach Hire business based in the village.
